Keywords: Excalibur , Hellfire Club , Marauders , Pirate , Quiet Council , X-Men
Real Name: Katherine Pryde
Special Powers
THE MARAUDERS WILL GET YOU HOME: Friendly characters with the Marauders keyword have, "FREE: If this effect has not been used this turn and if this character occupies an opposing player's starting area, generate a Stranded Mutant bystander."
INTANGIBILITY: Phasing/Teleport, Flight.
I REALLY LIKE THAT SWORD: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When she uses it and hits an equipped opposing character, after resolutions that character unequips their equipment.

August 26, 2022
notoriousv
[QUOTE=KlaudyD;12207002]Play Her With HOX Emma Frost, Tempo from rise and fall, and common Magik from this set. Have Magik eventually teleport you into the Enemy Starting Line, Spawn a Bystander next to Tempo, have Tempo give them a Free +3 Speed and have them Run away or give it to Kate and have her carry them back to your starting line. Emma will make it so everyone within 4 of her take max 1 Dmg so you can Survive. If anyone goes down Krakoa Revive them with Emma. It's not perfect and your gonna have to find some good fighters because your so deep in enemy territory but it may be effective[/QUOTE] HOX Emma will only have them take max 1 if they've already been damaged.
August 2, 2022
KlaudyD
Play Her With HOX Emma Frost, Tempo from rise and fall, and common Magik from this set. Have Magik eventually teleport you into the Enemy Starting Line, Spawn a Bystander next to Tempo, have Tempo give them a Free +3 Speed and have them Run away or give it to Kate and have her carry them back to your starting line. Emma will make it so everyone within 4 of her take max 1 Dmg so you can Survive. If anyone goes down Krakoa Revive them with Emma. It's not perfect and your gonna have to find some good fighters because your so deep in enemy territory but it may be effective
